languages.text: "...Ибо кровь ваша — в их руках и сердцах. Ибо смерть ваша — в дланях моих".

traits.locale_text: "...Ибо кровь ваша — в их руках и сердцах. Ибо смерть ваша — в дланях моих".

languages.text: "'...For your blood is in their hands and their hearts. For your death is in the palms of my hands.'"
languages.original_text: "...Ибо кровь ваша — в их руках и сердцах. Ибо смерть ваша — в дланях моих".

languages.text: « ... Car votre sang coule dans leurs mains et leurs cœurs. Car votre mort est dans la paume de Mes mains. »
languages.original_text: "'...For your blood is in their hands and their hearts. For your death is in the palms of my hands.'"

traits.locale_text: « ... Car votre sang coule dans leurs mains et leurs cœurs. Car votre mort est dans la paume de Mes mains. »

languages.text: «"... Pues vuestra sangre está en sus manos y corazones. Pues vuestra muerte está en la palma de mi mano"».
languages.original_text: "'...For your blood is in their hands and their hearts. For your death is in the palms of my hands.'"

traits.locale_text: «"... Pues vuestra sangre está en sus manos y corazones. Pues vuestra muerte está en la palma de mi mano"».

languages.text: 「『…汝の血は彼らの手と心の中にある。汝の死は、私の手のひらの中にあるのだ』」
languages.original_text: "'...For your blood is in their hands and their hearts. For your death is in the palms of my hands.'"

traits.locale_text: 「『…汝の血は彼らの手と心の中にある。汝の死は、私の手のひらの中にあるのだ』」

languages.text: “‘……因为你们的鲜血沾染了他们的双手与灵魂，因为你们的生死掌握在我的掌中。’”
languages.original_text: "'...For your blood is in their hands and their hearts. For your death is in the palms of my hands.'"

traits.locale_text: “‘……因为你们的鲜血沾染了他们的双手与灵魂，因为你们的生死掌握在我的掌中。’”

languages.text: "'... Denn Euer Blut ist in ihren Händen und ihren Herzen. Denn Euer Tod ist in den Flächen meiner Hände.'"
languages.original_text: "'...For your blood is in their hands and their hearts. For your death is in the palms of my hands.'"

traits.locale_text: "'... Denn Euer Blut ist in ihren Händen und ihren Herzen. Denn Euer Tod ist in den Flächen meiner Hände.'"

languages.text: "Çünkü kanınız onların ellerinde ve yüreklerinde. Çünkü ölümünüz avuçlarımın içinde."
languages.original_text: "'...For your blood is in their hands and their hearts. For your death is in the palms of my hands.'"
